institution:
Alma Mater Studiorum
University of Bologna - Campus of Cesena
title:
Bachelor of Science Degree (Laurea triennale)
Computer Engineering Curriculum
text: The study plan aims to offer students a new training opportunity: to study computer science in a more comprehensive way and to explore the design/engineering and mathematical/scientific aspects. The presence of several research groups, known internationally, allows students to touch the world of research and gives access to a didactical offer at the highest levels.

institution:
Istituto Tecnico Industriale Statale
Leonardo da Vinci - Rimini, Italy
title: Computer Expert (Perito Industriale)
text: ITIS Leonardo da Vinci provides five areas of specialization: computer science, mechanics, electronics, electrical engineering and chemistry. Its 3,000 graduates have distinguished themselves for the important positions they achieved in the companies they work for and that gives the Institute a great reputation.

institution:
Scuola Secondaria Superiore
della Repubblica di San Marino
title: Biennium of Technical-Industrial Institute
text: It's the technique school of the Republic. Established in 1981 to offer a significant opportunity in the training of local professionals intermediate, the school provides preliminary preparation of the first two years of study by the Industrial Technical Institutes. The continuation of studies in the following three years takes place outside the territory, at Technical Institutes in neighboring regions.
